metadata.title: Yuzu Labs - Fitness and Wellness App
metadata.description: Yuzu is your personal wellness coach. Stretching, pain relief, splits training and anti-stress exercises.

hero.title: Yuzu, your
hero.subtitle: Guided stretching, pain relief and anti-stress exercises. Achieve your flexibility goals with your favorite lemon companion.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Features designed for your daily wellness

painRelief.title: Pain Relief
painRelief.description: Targeted exercises to relieve tension in your back, neck and joints.

stretching.title: Stretching Programs
stretching.description: Structured sessions to improve your flexibility every day.

splits.title: Splits Training
splits.description: A progressive program to safely achieve the splits.

antiStress.title: Anti-Stress Exercises
antiStress.description: Breathing and relaxation techniques to calm your mind.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Visualize your progress and stay motivated with detailed statistics.

personalized.title: Personalized Programs
personalized.description: Recommendations tailored to your level and goals.

mascot.title: Meet Yuzu
mascot.subtitle: Your wellness companion
mascot.description: Yuzu is an energetic little lemon who accompanies you through all your exercises. Always encouraging, never sour!

testimonial1.text: Thanks to Yuzu, I finally achieved the splits! The program is progressive and very well explained.
testimonial1.author: Marie L.

testimonial2.text: My back pain has significantly decreased. The exercises are perfectly adapted to my pace.
testimonial2.author: Thomas D.

testimonial3.text: The Yuzu mascot motivates me every day! A simple but incredibly effective app.
testimonial3.author: Sophie M.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? Don't hesitate to reach out
contact.name: Your name
contact.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

footer.description: Yuzu Labs develops innovative wellness applications to improve your quality of life every day.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.provider: This website is hosted by Vercel Inc.
hosting.address: 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this website (texts, images, logos, illustrations) is the exclusive property of Yuzu Labs or its partners. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of all or part of the website elements, by any means or process, is prohibited without prior written authorization from Yuzu Labs.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Yuzu Labs is committed to protecting the privacy of users of its application and website. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data.

collection.title: Data Collected
collection.content: We collect the following data: account information (email, name), application usage data, user preferences, and exercise progress data.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.content: Your data is used to: personalize your experience, improve our services, send you notifications about your progress, and provide customer support.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses essential cookies for the service to function and analytical cookies to improve the user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your data. To exercise these rights, contact us at yuzu.contactme@gmail.com.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Your data is kept for the duration of your use of the service and up to 3 years after your last activity, unless otherwise required by law.

contact.title: DPO Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding the protection of your data, you can contact our Data Protection Officer at: yuzu.contactme@gmail.com

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: These terms of use govern access to and use of the Yuzu application and the yuzulabs.fr website.

object.title: Purpose of the Service
object.content: Yuzu is a fitness and wellness application offering stretching programs, pain relief exercises and anti-stress techniques.

access.title: Access to the Service
access.content: Access to the application requires creating a user account. The user agrees to provide accurate information and to maintain the confidentiality of their credentials.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All application content (exercises, illustrations, texts, videos) is protected by copyright and belongs to Yuzu Labs. Any unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

responsibility.title: Liability
responsibility.content: Yuzu Labs cannot be held responsible for injuries that may occur during exercise practice. Consult a healthcare professional before starting any exercise program.

modification.title: Modification of Terms
modification.content: Yuzu Labs reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Users will be notified of any significant changes.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: These Terms are governed by French law. Any dispute shall be submitted to the competent courts of Mulhouse.
